targets.expr: sum by(pod) (vector_buffer_byte_size{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id"})
sum by(pod) (vector_buffer_events{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id"})
sum by (pod) (rate(vector_component_received_events_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

sum by (component_id) (rate(vector_component_received_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))
sum by(pod) (rate(vector_component_sent_events_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

sum by (component_id) (rate(vector_component_sent_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

sum by (component_id) (rate(vector_component_errors_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) > 0
sum by (pod) (rate(vector_component_errors_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) > 0

sum by (component_id) (rate(vector_component_discarded_events_total{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))
sum by (pod) (rate(vector_utilization{cluster=~"$cluster", component_kind=~"$component_kind", component_type=~"$component_type", component_id=~"$component_id", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) > 0
